Ayder.title: Ayder
Ayder.byline: Ayder is a resort town in Eastern Karadeniz region of Turkey, up in the lush Kaçkar Mountains, surrounded by waterfalls.

Aydincik.title: Aydincik
Aydincik.byline: Aydıncık is a small town (population: about 7,000) in southern part of Cilician Mountains, Mediterranean Turkey.
